title: Whoops: Blizzard leaked the name of the next Hearthstone expansion through its own online store
description: A new t-shirt for something called Showdown in the Badlands briefly appeared on Blizzard's Gear Store.

title: Cities: Skylines 2 won't use Steam Workshop for mod sharing
description: The city builder will use Paradox Mods instead, with in-game integration.

title: Starfield lead quest designer leaves Bethesda to work on the open-world RPG Wyrdsong
description: Will Shen was at Bethesda for nearly 15 years, serving as a designer on games including Skyrim, Fallout 4, and Starfield.

title: World of Warcraft: Dragonflight’s next update adds an ancient realm players have wanted to explore for years
description: Blizzard says patch 10.2, as it's more prosaically known, will go live just a few days after BlizzCon.

title: Payday 3's long-awaited first patch is delayed again: 'Please bear with us'
description: Starbreeze is taking extra time to make the patching process faster for the future.

title: League of Legends has a boy band now, 'a group of dynamic daredevils dedicated to unapologetic individuality and creative expression'
description: The first single from Heartsteel, called Paranoia, will drop next week.

title: Cities: Skylines 2 devs warn players of performance problems: 'we have not achieved the benchmark we targeted'
description: Ahead of the city builder's release on October 24, the devs want to "manage expectations on performance."

title: Pete Hines, Bethesda's number-one PR guy for nearly 25 years, is leaving the company
description: Hines announced his retirement today.

title: Wizard with a Gun review
description: Not quite a bullseye, but darn close.

title: Minecraft is the first videogame ever to sell more than 300 million copies
description: And 62 million of those were in the last two-and-a-half years.

title: Omni-Man's Mortal Kombat 1 trailer is a splatter-filled gauntlet of Invincible's most harrowing scenes
description: The Omni-Man train is pulling into the station.

title: All Lords of the Fallen Rune Tablet locations
description: Gather these runic artifacts to help Gerlinde or free Sparky.

title: Intel's new 14th Gen chips are almost a carbon copy of its 13th Gen, fortunately including the price
description: Raptor Lake refresh is here, with no alarms and no surprises.

title: Graphics card modder shows AIB vendors you really can have a dual slot RTX 4080
description: So if he can do it, there's no excuse for the big manufacturers not to do the same.

title: Van Gogh Museum forced to stop distributing special Pikachu cards after scalpers storm the gates: '[we] take the safety and security of visitors and staff very seriously'
description: The Pokemon Company will instead be selling the cards online.

title: Climate activists land devastating blow against big oil by disrupting minor Tekken tournament
description: Competitive videogames are the latest target of the Just Stop Oil group's disruption tactics.

title: Blizzard pulls Diablo Season 2 trailer that got almost everything wrong, its fumbled sums stunlocking this streamer with laughter
description: There's a lot to unpack here.

title: How to free Gerlinde and upgrade weapons in Lords of the Fallen
description: Use Deralium to improve your favourite demon-slaying armaments.

title: Nvidia's hiking its GeForce Now membership fees by up to 40%
description: Canadian gamers are the ones who will suffer the most.

title: AMD's Fluid Motion Frames tech now works in any DX11 and DX12 game with any RX 7000 and RX 6000-series graphics card
description: It won't magically make a slow card fast though.

title: Problem with Nvidia GeForce RTX 4090 Founders Edition turns out to be a literal bug trapped inside
description: Not a moth this time, but still.

title: Here's a remarkably open-ended sci-fi RPG inspired by the classics
description: One of those games with so many branching options it's very short by nature.

title: Wordle today: Hint and answer for #849 Monday, October 16
description: Today's Wordle: Help with solving Monday's puzzle.

title: Five new Steam games you probably missed (October 16, 2023)
description: Sorting through every new game on Steam so you don't have to.

title: Manage your inventory to PvP glory in the demo of autobattler Backpack Battles
description: Puzzle out new item combinations—then fit them in your bag.

title: Minecraft 1.21: everything we know about the next major Minecraft update
description: The 1.21 update is all about new combat challenges so far.
